title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 § 680.10 - Reserved
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 § 680.10 - Reserved

State Regulations

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
§
680.10

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

Reserved

New

York State Register October 9, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 41, eff. 10/9/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. (a) No individual who resides in a specialty hospital shall be deprived of any civil or legal right guaranteed to all citizens solely because of a diagnosis of developmental disability. All individuals shall be given the respect and dignity that is extended to every person regardless of race, religion, national origin, creed, sex, ethnic background or disability. (b) The specialty hospital shall protect the rights of each individual as prescribed by the
commissioner
and regulations of OPWDD. Notes
